bibl.title: Image to Interpretation. An Intelligent System to Aid Historians in Reading the Vindolanda Texts. (Oxford Studies in Ancient Documents.)

author.forename: with a Foreword by Professor Alan K.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. How Do Papyrologists Read Ancient Texts? Knowledge Elicitation and the Papyrologist (1). - 3. The Palaeography of Vindolanda.
